text: Bernard Baudean is a French para-alpine skier. He represented France in alpine skiing at six Winter Paralympics: in 1976, 1980, 1984, 1988, 1992 and 1994. In total he won six gold medals, four silver medals and one bronze medal. == Achievements == {| class="wikitable" width=65% style="font-size:90%; text- align:center;" |- !Year !!Competition !!Location
